CITY OF McLENDON CHISHOLM

MAYOR AND CITY COUNCIL
======================

Page Updated October 7, 2025 3:39 PM

![](https://mclendon-chisholm.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/BryanMcNeal2.jpg)

#### Mayor Bryan McNeal

#### Serving since May 2024.

[mayor@mclendon-chisholm.com](mailto:mayor@mclendon-chisholm.com)

[council4@mclendon-chisholm.com](mailto:council4@mclendon-chisholm.com)

[council5@mclendon-chisholm.com](mailto:council5@mclendon-chisholm.com)

#### Council Member Rich Dean Place 6 Serving since May 2025.

[council6@mclendon-chisholm.com](mailto:council6@mclendon-chisholm.com)

#### The City Council meets the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month at 6:30pm.

The Mayor and five Council Members serve for two-year terms.

[VIEW CITY COUNCIL AGENDAS & MINUTES](https://mclendonchisholmtx.portal.civicclerk.com/)

### McLENDON-CHISHOLM STATUS REPORT

[ROCKWALL COUNTY BURN BAN STATUS](https://www.rockwallcountytexas.com/996/Burn-Ban-Status)

### MEMORIAL BRICK CAMPAIGN

Honor a veteran (living or deceased) with a commemorative brick to be placed at the McLendon-Chisholm Veteran’s Memorial. Only $30 per brick.

[ORDER NOW](https://mclendon-chisholm.com/veterans-brick-campaign)

### CONTACT THE CITY

Main Office: (972) 524-2077

NEW HOURS  
(Effective June 1, 2025)  
Mon – Thur: 8:30AM – 5:30PM  
Closed Fridays
